column2: --> web automatically take margin bottom. to overcome this we can use this.
--> to remove the default bullet points of ul and ol.

column1: focus  --> to style the input field when it is focused.
mouse hover --> to style the element when mouse is hovered over it.
a:visited  --> to style the link which is already visited.
li-last-child  --> to style the last item of the list.
list-first-child  --> to style the first item of the list.
list-nth-child(n)  --> to style the nth item of the list.
li*5  --> to create 5 list items in one go in emmet.
